comments.body: These are the configurable endpoints I dropped support for.

I don't know. Maybe some people with some recent experience using GCS can comment. @francisdb, @DanieleSassoli, @gabrielreid ?

See Arman's note about introducing configuration breaking changes here: https://github.com/akka/alpakka/pull/2613#issuecomment-802101303
Just had a look, seems this was added by @jkobejs when he worked further on my pr. We are not using these settings so for my part ok to make unsupported.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@    private-key = deprecated

    # No longer supported, use config path alpakka.google.forward-proxy
    base-url = unsupported // "https://www.googleapis.com/" // default
    base-path = unsupported // "/storage/v1" // default
